live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!

Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available. Thank you for your patience!
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
64118.summary: Some customers in Calgary (Fairview) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64118.title: July 15 - Calgary (Fairview) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
